article: Paul got  _  the bus to go to the town. It was very crowded and he had to stand for about five  _  Then some of the people got  _  Paul sat down next  _  a fat woman. She  _  several shopping bags and Paul didn't have much place  _  the seat. He was uncomfortable.  _  last the bus got to the town. All the people started to get off. Paul was very polite, so he stood  _  to let the fat woman get off before him. She said,"  Thank you  " Then she tried to get  out of  the seat with all her bags. But she couldn't move. She was too fat and her bags were too heavy.
